page.title: 11NEW SPORTS HALL FOR BURWELL.
page.content: 7 years ago it was thought to be a good idea to build a{sports hall in Burwell.A{committee}was formed to raise the large sum needed.It{opened {this year}and can fit 4 full- size badminton courts and a proper tennis court.When fully finished,upstairs will be carpeted.It will have a bar, snooker,table-tennis and space- invaders. About 40 people go to{badminton}each week and about 25 for people go to {judo.}They have nearly{300 members. There are lots of other activities such as{5-a-side football, aerobics and{tennis.}Next term there will new clubs for gymnastics, dads'evenings and mother and child groups. In the long holiday things have been planned for children by volunteers from the community.
